paint.viewer.logic

Class RecordingOverrideWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.viewer.logic.RecordingOverrideWriter

  • public class RecordingOverrideWriter
extends Object
    Handles the writing of per-recording override configurations for the PAINT viewer. The RecordingOverrideWriter manages the creation and updating of a CSV file that stores user-defined control parameters (density ratio, variability, RÂ², and neighbour mode) for each recording.

    Each record is timestamped and replaces any previous entry for the same recording. The file is stored in the Viewer directory under the project root.

    This class mirrors SquareOverrideWriter but operates at the recording scope instead of per-square granularity.

      RecordingOverrideWriter(Path projectPath)
      Constructs a new RecordingOverrideWriter for the specified project.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RecordingOverrideWriter

        public RecordingOverrideWriter(Path projectPath)
        Constructs a new RecordingOverrideWriter for the specified project. Ensures that the Viewer directory exists and initializes the target file path for the override CSV.
        Parameters:
        projectPath - the root project path where the Viewer directory resides

    • Method Detail

      • applyAndWrite

        public void applyAndWrite(String scope,
                          SquareControlParams params,
                          List<RecordingEntry> recordings,
                          int currentIndex)
        Applies the provided parameters and writes overrides based on the specified scope. The scope determines whether overrides are applied at the Recording, Experiment, or Project level.
        Parameters:
        scope - the override scope ("Recording", "Experiment", or "Project")
        params - the parameter set containing density ratio, variability, RÂ², and neighbour mode values
        recordings - the list of available recording entries in the current session
        currentIndex - the index of the currently active recording
